name: TwitterOAuth Demo
description: Demo of the most popular PHP library for use with the Twitter OAuth REST API.

CONSUMER_KEY.description: Consumer Key from app registered at https://apps.twitter.com/.

CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Consumer Secret from app registered at https://apps.twitter.com/.

OAUTH_CALLBACK.description: Callback URL from app registered at https://apps.twitter.com/. If site is hosted at https://example.com/ use https://example.com/callback.php.

GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ID.description: Google Analytics if you would like to measure traffic to the demo site.
